Expert advice and guidance on your UCAS application

Book a One to One Appointment with our Admissions team.

We are here to help

Are you in the middle of your UCAS form and need some expert guidance and support?

Our Admissions team are here to help you whether you are a Y14 student, parent, or careers teacher. You can book a personal 30-minute appointment with our admissions team who can help you with the following topics:

  • The UCAS application process
  • Entry requirements
  • What makes a great application form
  • What impact is COVID-19 having on our application process and review
  • Course Options at Ulster University

A personalised appointment

Book a One to One Appointment with our Admissions team.

Book now  

Book a One to One Appointment with our Admissions team

When booking your appointment, we will ask you the topics you want to discuss during your appointment in advance. This ensures you will have the appropriate Admissions expert on your call.

Appointments Available Monday to Friday 9 to 5pm

Every week we will release appointments up to 2 weeks in advance. Appointments are available throughout the day from 9 to 5pm Monday to Friday.

You will be asked if you want to conduct the appointment via Skype, Microsoft Teams or phone call. A Skype or Zoom call would allow for participants to join from multiple locations.
